member.name: T:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Send.Func.SendFunction
member.summary: Azure Function App triggered by messages from a Service Bus queue Used for sending messages from the bot.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Send.Func.SendFunction.MaxDeliveryCountForDeadLetter
member.summary: This is set to 10 because the default maximum delivery count from the service bus message queue before the service bus will automatically put the message in the Dead Letter Queue is 10.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The service to precheck and determine if the queue message should be processed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Send.Func.SendFunction.Run(System.String,System.Int32,System.DateTime,System.String,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.ExecutionContext)
member.summary: Azure Function App triggered by messages from a Service Bus queue Used for sending messages from the bot.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Send.Func.SendFunctionOptions
member.summary: Options used to configure the Company Communicator Send Function.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Send.Func.SendFunctionOptions.MaxNumberOfAttempts
member.summary: Gets or sets the max number of request attempts.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Send.Func.SendFunctionOptions.SendRetryDelayNumberOfSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds to delay before retrying to send the message.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Send.Func.Services.INotificationService.IsSendNotificationThrottled
member.summary: Checks if the send notification is throttled.
member.returns: true if the send notification is throttled, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Send.Func.Services.INotificationService.IsPendingNotification(Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Common.Services.MessageQueues.SendQueue.SendQueueMessageContent)
member.summary: Checks if the notification is pending.
member.returns: true if the notification is pending, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Send.Func.Services.INotificationService.IsNotificationCanceled(Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Common.Services.MessageQueues.SendQueue.SendQueueMessageContent)
member.summary: Check if the notification is canceled.
member.returns: true if the notification is canceled, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Send.Func.Services.INotificationService.UpdateSentNotification(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates sent notification for the recipient.
member.param: The recipient's unique identifier. If the recipient is a user, this should be the AAD Id. If the recipient is a team, this should be the team Id.
The total number of throttled requests to send the notification.
A comma separated list representing all of the status code responses received when trying to send the notification to the recipient.
The error reason to store in the database.
The exception message to store in the database.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The global sending notification data repository.

member.summary: Register services in DI container of the Azure functions system.
